text: Ndikosaloledwa kuti Mtumwi wina aliyense atenge katundu wopeza munkhondo mopanda kulamulidwa ndipo aliyense amene anyenga omutsatira ake pa nkhani ya chuma chopeza ku nkhondo, adzanyamula patsiku louka kwa akufa zimene iye anatenga mopanda chilolezo. Ndipo munthu aliyense adzalipidwa molingana ndi zochita zake ndipo iwo sadzaponderezedwa ai
